answers.answer: poor kitty she sounds like she is really feeling miserable.reading on the holistic information many have use an antibiotic called ZYMOX and it proves to be very effective for bacterial infections.her immune system is very compromised with the diabetes and any added problem will be resistant to treatment.A chronic upper respiratory infection can be very dangerous.Has she been tested for Felv?I am sending you a link for some good info on thiswww.holisticat.com/uri.htmlI wish kitty all the best of luck for a successful recovery, please keep posting and tell us how she is doing.

question: Hi, For the last 4 monts my 16 year old diabetic cat has had a chronic nasal infection. She now has a small hole in the side of her nose that exudes pus. Synulox and marbocyl have proved ineffective. Cancer and fungal infection have been ruled out. Please can anyone help?
title: Chronic nasal infection in a diabetic cat
